Tell them, Greta.

When people try to mock you personally instead of engaging the substance of your advocacy, it’s because they know how powerful you are, and that the truth is on your side.

Keep inspiring and organizing.

We’re going to save the planet.
All of us, together. 🌎 https://twitter.com/gretathunberg/status/1167916177927991296 QT @GretaThunberg When haters go after your looks and differences, it means they have nowhere left to go. And then you know you’re winning!

Georgia and South Carolina, please be safe. If you are in Hurricane Dorian's projected path, visit https://www.ready.gov/hurricanes for information on how to prepare.

Average cost of a year of college: $50,000
Median family income: $61,000

We let middle-class parents drown in debt trying to ensure a middle-class future for their kids. That is obscene.

We must cancel student debt and make public colleges tuition-free. https://www.nytimes.com/2019/08/30/opinion/sunday/college-tuition.html

Uber and Lyft are prepared to spend millions so they can continue classifying their workers as "independent contractors" to exploit them and deny them protections. The California Senate must pass AB 5, and all Democrats should fight this ballot measure. https://www.cnbc.com/2019/08/29/uber-and-lyft-pledge-60-million-to-fight-california-ballot-measure.html

I’m heartbroken for the families of the victims in the Odessa and Midland shooting. Our children deserve a future without multiple mass shootings in one month. 

We need gun safety reform.

Sen Marco Rubio has spoken to @POTUS & @GovRonDeSantis. The State of Florida is ready to respond to #HurricaneDorian. 

Be sure you are prepared, & know what you & your family need for the next 7 days after the storm. 

Get hurricane prepared: https://www.rubio.senate.gov/public/index.cfm?p=hurricane-preparedness http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1167779269235417089/pu/img/f98eqh89i3sdq3Er.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1167779269235417089/pu/vid/480x270/GkVQQ4RMUO00npGC.mp4?tag=10

Billionaires and large corporations oppose us because they know they can't buy us. We don't want their money.

Our campaign has received 2.5 million contributions from people around the country. That is what a movement to defeat Trump and transform America looks like.

A 17-month-old baby.

It’s perverse that we live in a society where this is allowed to happen. My heart goes out to all those affected by today’s mass shootings in Odessa and Midland, Texas. https://twitter.com/newswest9/status/1167929150671179781 QT @newswest9 UMC has confirmed a 17 month old is on the way to Lubbock after being shot in the face. http://www.newswest9.com/article/news/crime/odessa-shooter/513-17dbe2e0-4b2b-487e-91a8-281a4e6aa3b8

Beginning on Day One in office, I will take executive action to reduce gun violence—closing dangerous loopholes in gun sales, cracking down on gun manufacturers, and investing in communities impacted by gun violence.

Eviction is devastating on its own, but the cycle it causes can send individuals into a spiral of financial distress. My housing justice plan will end tenant blacklisting & create an Eviction Right to Counsel Fund for tenants who need legal representation. https://corybooker.com/issues/housing/

Working people are angry and they have a right to be angry.

Their government and economy are rigged against them so the phenomenally wealthy can get even wealthier. I think it's about time we had a government that works for the working class. https://twitter.com/wsjecon/status/1167414794602917888?s=11 QT @WSJecon The bottom half of all U.S. households have 32% less wealth than in 2003. The top 1% have more than twice as much as they did then. https://trib.al/6AelvRA

Two cruel announcements were made by the Trump administration this past week: Children of some U.S. military service members will no longer receive automatic American citizenship. Immigrants with serious medical conditions will soon be deported.

This isn't who we are.

This is the sort of weekend that terrifies people living paycheck-to-paycheck:
🏠 Rent is due Sunday 9/1
💰 Friday’s deposited paycheck may not clear for days because of the holiday weekend

Overdraft fees & payday lenders shouldn't be the solution. I’ve got a bill for that.

We have a racist criminal justice system that must be fundamentally transformed. https://www.cnn.com/2019/08/30/us/alabama-man-three-strikes-law-trnd/index.html

For men who are allegedly so “proud” of being straight, they seem to show real incompetence at attracting women to their event.

Seems more like a “I-Struggle-With-Masculinity” parade to me. 🤷🏽‍♀️

It is nothing less than barbaric that the leading cause of bankruptcy in America is medical debt.

These people didn't spend all their money on luxury items. Their crime was that they got sick.

We are going to cancel all $81 billion in existing past-due medical debt.

Bret Stephens always displays civility & decency. He treats people with respect and engages on substance; he would never resort to ad hominem attack, compare someone to a Nazi, or display “the conviction that an opponent embodies an irredeemable evil.” https://twitter.com/brhodes/status/1167622965413863425 QT @brhodes Letting a columnist equate someone who called him a bedbug on twitter to Nazis is quite an editorial choice.

I'm heartsick for the victims of this latest mass shooting in Odessa and Midland. We shouldn't have to live with this near daily fear and horror. We've already lost far too many to gun violence—Congress must act now. https://twitter.com/TexasTribune/status/1167931298511343618 QT @TexasTribune On CNN, the mayor of Midland says:
+ 1 confirmed shooter killed
+ At least 20 citizens injured
+ 1 Midland police offer was shot
+ 1 DPS officer injured

Secretary DeVos, your job is to defend our students, not sell them out to predatory for-profit colleges.

My Secretary of Education will stand with students and families to cancel all student debt and make all public colleges tuition-free.

To everyone in the path of Hurricane Dorian: Now is the time to check on your neighbors and the elderly. Be sure to listen to local officials for information and potential evacuation orders. Stay alert.

Today we’re getting all our NY-14 children ready for back-to-school by providing backpacks and school supplies at local parks & block parties!

Tucked inside our backpacks was a special note from me to all our students for the upcoming school year: https://twitter.com/news12bx/status/1167900933121957888 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EDVLrK-U4AEJc-m.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EDVLrK_U0AAfB1f.jpg QT @News12BX WATCH: Rep. @AOC discusses an effort to help get #Bronx students back-to-school ready, and shares her message for success this school year. http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1167900806906953733/pu/img/rZmhhW1Rl4eCgnUp.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1167900806906953733/pu/vid/480x270/gGM-QGfB6F8BOKfK.mp4?tag=10
Heidi and I are heartbroken by this heinous attack, and we are lifting up in prayer all the victims, their families, and the entire Midland-Odessa community.

We are thankful for the law enforcement officers who heroically risked their lives and acted swiftly to stop the shooter and save others. Their courage helped prevent even more senseless deaths, and we honor their tireless commitment to protecting us all.

We must speak out when we have a president and an administration who believe that “Islam hates us.”

We must speak out at hate crimes and violence targeted at the Muslim community - and call it what it is - domestic terrorism. #ISNACON

RT @WajahatAli Bernie Sanders at ISNA conference just said "India's action [in Kashmir] is unacceptable," criticizing its crackdown in Kashmir, revoking its semi autonomous status and the humanitarian crisis that has ensued. Glad a Democratic candidate is discussing this openly.

Keeping the Midland and Odessa community and the victims in my thoughts and prayers. Grateful to first responders who ran into harm's way. 

I’m sick of this. America is sick of this. 

We need to act.

My Payment Modernization Act would create a national payments system so the money deposited in your bank account appears in real-time. No more living in fear over Labor Day that your rent will be processed before your paycheck clears. Congress should act to make this happen.

I'm a boxing fan, but that's not the only reason why Muhammad Ali is a hero of mine. It was also the incredible courage he showed outside the ring. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EDU3Cl3UwAA3TV8.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1167898937258176512/vid/320x320/KsBA1WD3SOsertkJ.mp4?tag=13

It's estimated that more than 12.5 million African souls were captured and enslaved between 1514 and 1866.

This month marked 400 years since the first enslaved Africans arrived in what would become the United States. We cannot forget this horrific part of our nation's history. https://twitter.com/reuterspictures/status/1154790761344512002 QT @reuterspictures Chains, shackles and documents are among the horrific and brutal reminders of the Africa-to-North America slave trade, which began 400 years ago. A look at some of these artifacts: https://www.reuters.com/news/picture/artifacts-of-the-slave-trade-idUSRTX70YYW (1/10) http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EAajAkCWkAAugd4.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EAajAkGXYAMfPWB.jpg

Enough is enough. Every day, the gun violence epidemic inflicts a devastating toll in communities across America, this time

Time’s up, @SenateMajLdr. Let’s vote on gun safety legislation NOW. Every day you wait, more tragedies happen. 

Do something, Senator McConnell. America is done waiting for you.

✅ Update your emergency contacts
